thread.title: Dewey & LeBoeuf Inflated Key Financial Metrics, Witness Says
thread.title_full: Dewey & LeBoeuf Inflated Key Financial Metrics, Witness Says - WSJ

author: Sara Randazzo
title: Dewey & LeBoeuf Inflated Key Financial Metrics, Witness Says
text:
Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP inflated key financial metrics by as much as 1,000% in the years leading up to the law firm’s 2012 collapse, jurors were told Wednesday, as prosecutors presented their final round of evidence in a case against three former Dewey leaders.
A forensic accountant talked jurors through years of data compiled by prosecutors from the Manhattan district attorney’s office, ultimately showing that between 2008 and 2012,...
